title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 September 2015 - XWiki
content:

09:08 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
09:08 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <vmassol> now on to 7.2RC1 :)  
09:49 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <sorinello> has quit  
09:53 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <sorinello> has quit  
09:55 <Pbas> Hello everyone, a quick question:  
09:56 <Pbas> Is it possible to display 2 livetable on same page?  
09:56 <vmassol> Pbas: hi, yes it's possible normally  
09:56 <vmassol> make sure to use different ids  
09:57 <Pbas> Ok thxs I will check the doc :-)  
09:58 <Pbas> Found it thxs: #livetable($id $columns $columnsProperties $options)  
09:58 <vmassol> yep  
09:58 <gdelhumeau> not sure  
09:58 <silverdr1p> is now known as <vrachieru>  
09:58 <gdelhumeau> because when you change a filter, it update the URL  
09:58 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I'm using that in the github stats app :)  
09:58 <gdelhumeau> so it can affect the 2 livetables  
09:59 <vmassol> (that = 2 LT)  
09:59 <gdelhumeau> ok then  
09:59 <vmassol> that's why the id was introduced btw  
09:59 <vmassol> now someone may have broken some part of it later on but I'm not aware of any issue ATM  
10:00 <Pbas> BTW you don't want my patch about boolean value?  
10:00 <vmassol> I don't know, haven't seen it myself. TBH we're very busy with trying to finish Nested Spaces for 7.2  
10:00 <Ramona1> has quit  
10:00 <vmassol> so maybe that's why you didn't get much answer?  
10:00 <vmassol> but that's not an excuse  
10:01 <vmassol> you should ping us in the PR again!  
10:01 <Pbas> k probably my patch is too ugly then  
10:01 <vmassol> you had no answer at all?  
10:01 <vmassol> it was holid&y time too probably  
10:01 <Pbas> nope :-)  
10:02 <Pbas> it doesn't matter  
10:04 <Pbas> Fyi here, I refound it :-) : http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6118  
10:06 <vmassol> Pbas: you have a PR open?  
10:07 <vmassol> adding missing status in jira  
10:07 <Pbas> yes: https://github.com/Pbast/xwiki-platform/commit/0db780c09a057286d26c3e0b8ed99be89bcfa1ac  
10:07 <vmassol> that's not a PR  
10:07 <vmassol> :)  
10:07 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <vmassol> that's a commit in your github repo  
10:08 <Pbas> ho wait I wasn't connected  
10:09 <Pbas> here: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/399  
10:09 <vmassol> ok thanks, updating status  
10:09 <Pbas> Like I comment there is probably a best way but ...  
10:10 <Pbas> ... too lazy  
10:10 <vmassol> indeed your comment isn't too engaging :)  
10:10 <vmassol> "Here my (not so) nice fix"  
10:10 <Pbas> hé hé  
10:10 <vmassol> ok I've set: Pull Request Status: Awaiting Committer feedback  
10:10 <vmassol> it'll now appear in our weekly email reminder  
10:11 <Pbas> I don't want to force anybody ;-))  
10:16 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:22 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <vmassol> yes! annotation tsts passed in platform at last! :)  
10:23 <vmassol> committing  
10:30 <sorinello> has quit

10:57 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <vmassol> ClemensR: nice Clemens :)  
11:03 <vmassol> step 6 has a typo I think  
11:03 <vmassol> " attach the following pages" —> images? icons?  
11:04 <ClemensR> vmassol: thanks - figured out it was non-obvious as I needed more than 5 minute todo it  
11:04 <ClemensR> oh,yes, and lots atypos for sure  
11:04 <vmassol> yup  
11:04 <ClemensR> fixing ...  
11:04 <Ramona1> has quit  
11:05 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
11:12 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
12:12 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:12 <vmassol> thanks tmortagne  
12:19 <evalica> vmassol: if mflorea finished the release, should I start the 6.4.5 release?  
12:19 <mflorea> +1  
12:19 <evalica> could you check a bit the tests on ci. There is a mail one, an ui one, but they might be flickers  
12:21 <tmortagne> evalica: all are (very) flickering test AFAIK  
12:21 <evalica> tmortagne: thanks  
12:21 <vmassol> evalica: ok on my side  
12:21 <vmassol> (if the tests are all flickers)  
12:22 <vmassol> (the ok was to release 6.4.5, I don't know its state)  
12:23 <tmortagne> evalica: I made a mistake while removing some clirr exclude yesterday which leaded in a clirr check error so I took this opportunity to fill http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki645#HAPIBreakages (so no need for you to do it)  
12:23 <evalica> tmortagne: very thankful :P  
12:29 <tmortagne> Enygma`: in XWIKI-12457 was the wiki created from a wiki template ?  
12:29 <tmortagne> (trying to reproduce to debug it)  
12:31 <evalica> tmortagne: in order to reproduce, just create a subwiki and then leave your instance be … and do something else. Your processor fan will start in some time  
12:32 <tmortagne> did you get a " The wiki wiki2 has been created but some documents have  not been installed. In consequence, the wiki might behave erroneously  and you should probably delete it. " ?  
12:32 <evalica> tmortagne:  default settings, just click -click  
12:32 <tmortagne> an hibernate exception sounds like the kind of thing XStream might have a hard time to serialize  
12:33 <tmortagne> hmm looks like there is 2 job status serializer threads  
12:36 <Denis> has quit

13:00 <Enygma`> tmortagne: no template, simple wiki.
